org.jetel.ctl

Class TLCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.TLCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITLCompiler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphParametersTLCompiler

    public class TLCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITLCompiler
    CTL frontend of compiler. It performs parsing, semantic pass, type checking and flow control.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TLCompiler

        public TLCompiler()
        Constructs TLCompiler to run graph-less, in standalone mode. This constructor should be only used by clients wishing to interpret simple CTL expression (i.e. no compilation), as the compilation will complain about unresolved metadata, lookups and sequences due to missing graph reference.

      • TLCompiler

        public TLCompiler(TransformationGraph graph,
          DataRecordMetadata[] inMetadata,
          DataRecordMetadata[] outMetadata)
        Creates reusable CTL compiler instance. This is identical to TLCompiler(TransformationGraph, DataRecordMetadata[], DataRecordMetadata[], String) with encoding="UTF-8"
        Parameters:
        graph - Graph to validate against (must not be null)
        inMetadata - Component's input metadata
        outMetadata - Component's output metadata

      • TLCompiler

        public TLCompiler(TransformationGraph graph,
          DataRecordMetadata[] inMetadata,
          DataRecordMetadata[] outMetadata,
          java.lang.String encoding)
        Creates reusable CTL compiler instance using specified encoding for parsing
        Parameters:
        graph - Graph to validate against (must not be null)
        inMetadata - Component's input metadata
        outMetadata - Component's output metadata
        encoding - Encoding to use when reading from the input stream

      • compileExpression

        public java.util.List<ErrorMessage> compileExpression(java.lang.String code,
                                             java.lang.Class<?> targetInterface,
                                             java.lang.String componentId,
                                             java.lang.String syntheticFunctionName,
                                             java.lang.Class<?> syntheticReturnType)
        Compiles CTL expression by wrapping it into synthetic function with specified name and return type, then compiles the resulting code by calling compile(String, Class, String).
        Specified by:
        compileExpression in interface ITLCompiler
        Parameters:
        code - CTL expression
        targetInterface - Java interface into which the code should be compiled.
        componentId - Identifier of calling component (will become part of Java class name)
        syntheticFunctionName - Name of synthetic function to create.
        syntheticReturnType - Expected type of expression (as well as return type of synthetic function).
        Returns:
        Compilation error messages as return by compile(String, Class, String).

      • wrapExpression

        protected java.lang.String wrapExpression(java.lang.String expression,
                              java.lang.String syntheticFunctionName,
                              java.lang.Class<?> returnType)
        Wraps CTL expression into synthetic CTL function with specified name and return type.
        Parameters:
        expression - CTL expression to wrap
        syntheticFunctionName - Name of synthetic function
        returnType - Type of CTL expression as well as expected return type of synthetic function.
        Returns:
        CTL expression wrapped into function evaluating it.

      • convertToJava

        public java.lang.String convertToJava(java.lang.String ctlCode,
                             java.lang.Class<?> targetInterface,
                             java.lang.String componentId)
                               throws ErrorMessageException
        Description copied from interface: ITLCompiler
        Converts a given CTL source code to Java source code in case the compiler supports CTL-to-Java conversion.
        Specified by:
        convertToJava in interface ITLCompiler
        Parameters:
        ctlCode - the CTL source code to be converted
        targetInterface - a Java interface into which the code should be compiled
        Returns:
        the Java source code as a string
        Throws:
        ErrorMessageException - if an error occurred

      • getCompiledCode

        public java.lang.Object getCompiledCode()
        Specified by:
        getCompiledCode in interface ITLCompiler
        Returns:
        Instance of TransformLangExecutor that can be used to interpret the CTL code. This method calls TransformLangExecutor.init() automatically.
